source:
TEXT_BANDWA107_03908_SEQ_00<tab>Regitt has metal on the mind.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA107_03908_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var>特殊ルール： レベルアジャスト受注クラス・ジョブ制限<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
※本クエストは受注時のクラスでのみ進行します。

ワッツハンマー・ガレージのレギットは、戦車に使うドワーフ鋼板の基礎部材を調達したいようだ。

source: TEXT_BANDWA107_03908_SEQ_01<tab>Speak with the dwarven smithy at Weathering.
target: TEXT_BANDWA107_03908_SEQ_01<tab>風化した大地の鋼板担当のドワーフと話す

source: TEXT_BANDWA107_03908_SEQ_02<tab>The dwarven metalsmith has tasked you with crafting steel sheet components, then delivering the completed items to Regitt.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA107_03908_SEQ_02<tab>風化した大地の鋼板担当のドワーフと話した
レギットに依頼された品を納品

source: TEXT_BANDWA107_03908_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the dwarven smithy at Weathering.
target: TEXT_BANDWA107_03908_TODO_00<tab>風化した大地の鋼板担当のドワーフと話す

source: TEXT_BANDWA107_03908_REGITT_000_001<tab>So, you've been wandering around the Anvil for a while now. Out of all the myriad materials we produce here, which do you reckon is the one we use the most of on a day-to-day basis?
target:
TEXT_BANDWA107_03908_REGITT_000_001<tab>お前さんは、ここワッツハンマー・ガレージで、
いちばん多く消費されている素材が何か、わかるラリ？
ズバリそれは、ドワーフ鋼板ラリ！

source: TEXT_BANDWA107_03908_REGITT_000_002<tab>If you guessed steel plates, then congratulations─seems your eyes are as keen as your hands. Indeed, the sound of a hammer on steel is the sound of creation here at the Anvil─the birth of anything from a simple chest to a tank fit for combat.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA107_03908_REGITT_000_002<tab>偉大なるワッツのドワーフ戦車も、
たった1枚の鋼板を叩くところから生まれるラリな～！

source: TEXT_BANDWA107_03908_REGITT_000_003<tab>Just like your eyes and your hands, I suppose your mind is keen enough to gather what I might be asking you to make next, then. We're constantly running low on steel sheets, and the whole of the Anvil would be grateful if you made a few for us. Go and see our smithy over at Weathering and tell him I sent you.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA107_03908_REGITT_000_003<tab>そこで、お前さんには鋼板の増産に協力してもらいたいラリ。
「鋼板担当のドワーフ」が素材を調達しに行っているラリな。
風化した大地で合流して、製作を手伝ってほしいラリ～！

source: TEXT_BANDWA107_03908_DAILYDWARF03908_000_010<tab>I take it you're the crafter who's meant to “save my arse,” as Regitt put it. He was quite effusive in regards to your skills, in his way, and if even half his blustering is true, then I'm glad to have you.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA107_03908_DAILYDWARF03908_000_010<tab>手伝ってくれる職人というのはキミかい？
レギットによると、経験豊富な熟練者らしいじゃないか。
そんな人がいれば大助かりだ！

source: TEXT_BANDWA107_03908_DAILYDWARF03908_000_011<tab>The materials we can gather here are altogether different from those we have in Kholusia, and we have our hands full trying to keep up with increasing demand. Any way you could help us would be a godssend.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA107_03908_DAILYDWARF03908_000_011<tab>ここで採れる素材は、コルシア島とは少し性質が違うから、
ボクらも増産に手間取っているんだ。
そこで、「<var 28 ((Item)) F279B501 /var>」の製作を依頼したい！

source: TEXT_BANDWA107_03908_DAILYDWARF03908_000_012<tab>I think a few ingots ought to help us along. Three, to be precise. This ore I've procured should suffice, but if for whatever reason you run out of materials, just get more from the automaton.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA107_03908_DAILYDWARF03908_000_012<tab>頼みたいのは、基礎となる合金塊を3つだ！
ボクが集めておいた、この鉱石を使うといい。
足りないときは、資材調達オートマトンから受け取ってくれ。

source: TEXT_BANDWA107_03908_DAILYDWARF03908_000_013<tab>A proper sheet of metal has to be scoured to a mirror shine, and for that we need the proper tools. Here, take these and let's see what you can come up with. If for whatever reason you run out of materials, just get more from the automaton.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA107_03908_DAILYDWARF03908_000_013<tab>頼みたいのは、仕上げ用の研磨道具を3つだ！
ボクが集めておいた、この素材を使うといい。
足りないときは、資材調達オートマトンから受け取ってくれ。

source: TEXT_BANDWA107_03908_DAILYDWARF03908_000_014<tab>Dull metal reflects the dullness of the builder's ambition, and so we polish our sheets to a mirror shine. For that, of course, you need something stronger than spit, and that's where you come in. Take these, and if for whatever reason you run out of materials, get more from the automaton.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA107_03908_DAILYDWARF03908_000_014<tab>頼みたいのは、仕上げ用の表面処理剤を3瓶分だ！
ボクが集めておいた、この素材を使うといい。
足りないときは、資材調達オートマトンから受け取ってくれ。

source: TEXT_BANDWA107_03908_DAILYDWARF03908_000_016<tab>Once you're finished, bring the materials to Regitt at once. Doubtless he is eager to begin ramping up production.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA107_03908_DAILYDWARF03908_000_016<tab>お願いした品が仕上がったら、
ガレージに戻って、「レギット」に渡してくれよ。
ドワーフ鋼板の増産工程は、ボクらにお任せあれだ！

source: TEXT_BANDWA107_03908_DAILYDWARF03908_000_116<tab>Remember, if you run out of materials, the automaton is here to provide whatsoever you need.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA107_03908_DAILYDWARF03908_000_116<tab>素材が足りないときは、
資材調達オートマトンから受け取ってくれ。

source: TEXT_BANDWA107_03908_DAILYDWARF03908_000_117<tab>Remember, if you run out of materials, the automaton is here to provide whatsoever you need.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA107_03908_DAILYDWARF03908_000_117<tab>素材が足りないときは、
資材調達オートマトンから受け取ってくれ。

source: TEXT_BANDWA107_03908_DAILYDWARF03908_000_118<tab>Remember, if you run out of materials, the automaton is here to provide whatsoever you need.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA107_03908_DAILYDWARF03908_000_118<tab>素材が足りないときは、
資材調達オートマトンから受け取ってくれ。

TEXT_BANDWA107_03908_AUTOMATON03908_000_017<tab>ガガ……素材イル？
……今は、必要なさそうだナ。

TEXT_BANDWA107_03908_AUTOMATON03908_000_018<tab>ガガ……素材イル？
……今は、必要なさそうだナ。

TEXT_BANDWA107_03908_AUTOMATON03908_000_019<tab>ガガ……素材イル？
……今は、必要なさそうだナ。

TEXT_BANDWA107_03908_AUTOMATON03908_000_020<tab>ガガ……素材イル？
ヘイヨー。

TEXT_BANDWA107_03908_AUTOMATON03908_000_021<tab>ガガ……素材イル？
ヘイヨー。

TEXT_BANDWA107_03908_AUTOMATON03908_000_022<tab>ガガ……素材イル？
ヘイヨー。

source: TEXT_BANDWA107_03908_DAILYDWARF03908_000_023<tab>Well, what're you doing? Don't stand around here─take the supplies to Regitt!
target:
TEXT_BANDWA107_03908_DAILYDWARF03908_000_023<tab>お願いした品は、仕上がったかい？
ガレージに戻ったら「レギット」に渡してくれたまえ！

source: TEXT_BANDWA107_03908_REGITT_000_030<tab>Ah, you are returned! I trust there were no insurmountable hurdles this time around.
target: TEXT_BANDWA107_03908_REGITT_000_030<tab>鋼板の部材、持ってきてくれたラリか？

source: TEXT_BANDWA107_03908_REGITT_000_031<tab>Perfection! With this we can produce even more sheets than we were before─and that means more metal for everyone!
target:
TEXT_BANDWA107_03908_REGITT_000_031<tab>ありがとラリ～！
これでドワーフ鋼板の増産が進められるラリよ！

source: TEXT_BANDWA107_03908_REGITT_000_032<tab>We use the sheets for everything from our helmets, to our homes, to our tanks! We will never be without a need for them, or for your expert hand.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA107_03908_REGITT_000_032<tab>ドワーフ鋼板は、この愛らしい兜から、
頑丈な建築物にドワーフ戦車まで、実に多彩な用途があるラリ！
在庫を欠かさないように、またお願いするラリ～！
